question: IISc Bengaluru has signed a MoU with which organisation to develop biomass gasification-based hydrogen generation technology?
explanation:
Indian Institute of Science Bengaluru has entered into an MoU with R&D Centre of Indian Oil Corporation Ltd (IOCL).
The partnership aims to develop biomass gasification-based hydrogen generation technology for producing fuel cell-grade hydrogen. The testing and development would take place in IOCLâ€™s R&D Centre in Faridabad.
